description: A tally of lawmakers’ stances on military action in Syria.
title: Where Lawmakers Stand on Military Action in Syria
title_page: Where Lawmakers Stand on Military Action in Syria - Interactive Graphic - NYTimes.com
text:
Where Lawmakers Stand on Military Action in Syria
Congress is sharply divided on whether to give President Obama authorization to order a military strike against the Syrian government in retaliation for a suspected chemical weapons attack. Below is a tally of each member’s stance, based on statements made on Web sites or through the news media.
